body:

Will I ever get unbanned?
body_tagged:

title: Unban/Support@Avicus

replies.body: Wait a week, if no response resend, the emails get lost really easily with all the emails they get a day
replies.body_tagged: Wait a week, if no response resend, the emails get lost really easily with all the emails they get a day

replies.body: I see I still have 4000 and more to read in my inbox.
replies.body_tagged: I see I still have 4000 and more to read in my inbox.

replies.body: Are you saying that you may have already gotten an email somewhere in your inbox? If so, most email services have a search feature that you can use. Otherwise, wait a bit. You will be replied to at some point. I'm sure that everyone handling the support email has probably been quite busy. Also, creating a forum topic isn't likely to speed up the response to your email. They will go through support emails in sequential order.
replies.body_tagged: Are you saying that you may have already gotten an email somewhere in your inbox? If so, most email services have a search feature that you can use. Otherwise, wait a bit. You will be replied to at some point. I'm sure that everyone handling the support email has probably been quite busy. Also, creating a forum topic isn't likely to speed up the response to your email. They will go through support emails in sequential order.

replies.body: Nah just shows the one I sent. I'll check over the time.
replies.body_tagged: Nah just shows the one I sent. I'll check over the time.

replies.body: Up until Sunday, we had 2 staff members handling the support email, one of those is currently away, so we had one handling them for about a week. Currently, with the new managers, two of them have exams this week. This leaves 2 of the total 5 people that can do it, doing it. Emails should be caught up on by the end of the weeks.
replies.body_tagged: Up until Sunday, we had 2 staff members handling the support email, one of those is currently away, so we had one handling them for about a week. Currently, with the new managers, two of them have exams this week. This leaves 2 of the total 5 people that can do it, doing it. Emails should be caught up on by the end of the weeks.
